PROJECT TITLE: FUEL TAX EVASION - FUEL TRACKING RESEARCH :::: PROJECT DESCRIPTION: THIS PROJECT WILL PROVIDE FUNDING TO IMPROVE INVESTIGATIONS AND DETECTION OF FRAUD, AS WELL AS TO BEGIN RESEARCH INTO THE TRACING OF FUEL SHIPMENTS INTO AND AROUND WASHINGTON STATE TO DETERMINE POTENTIAL BULK FUEL TAX EVASION.
THROUGH THIS PROJECT, MULTIPLE STATE AGENCIES WILL WORK COOPERATIVELY TO IDENTIFY REPORTED AND UN-REPORTED SHIPMENTS AND PROVIDE ADDITIONAL DATA AND DOCUMENTATION FOR ENFORCEMENT CASES WHICH ARE IDENTIFIED.
PROJECT TITLE: STATEWIDE, MOTOR FUEL TAX COMPLIANCE :::: PROJECT DESCRIPTION: STATEWIDE, JOINT FEDERAL/STATE MOTOR FUEL COMPLIANCE PROJECT.

PROJECT TITLE: 2021-2024 SOUTHERN REGION MOTOR FUEL TAX ACTIVITIES :::: PROJECT DESCRIPTION: EXPAND EFFORTS TO ENHANCE MOTOR FUEL TAX ENFORCEMENT, SUPPLEMENT MOTOR FUEL TAX EXAMINATIONS AND CRIMINAL INVESTIGATIONS, EVALUATE AND IMPLEMENT REGISTRATION AND REPORTING REQUIREMENTS FOR MOTOR FUEL TAXPAYERS. ANALYZE AND IMPLEMENT PROGRAMS TO REDUCE TAX EVASION ASSOCIATED WITH OTHER HIGHWAY USE TAXES AND FOREIGN IMPORTED FUEL, ADDRESS ISSUES RELATED TO INDIAN TRIBES AND STATE MOTOR FUEL TAXES.

PROJECT TITLE: JOINT NORTHEASTERN REGION INTERGOVERNMENTAL RESEARCH/AUDIT/ENFORCEMENT PROJECT (10/01/2020 – 9/30/2023) :::: PROJECT DESCRIPTION: THIS GRANT ESTABLISHED THE ABILITY FOR THE NORTHEASTERN REGION PARTICIPANTS TO HAVE THE ABILITY TO PARTICIPATE IN TRAINING, FUEL TAX MEETINGS (INCLUDING CRITICAL TASK FORCE MEETINGS), AND FUEL RELATED RESEARCH ON KEY FUEL TAX TOPICS IMPACTING THE REGION. THESE NORTHEASTERN REGION STATES INCLUDE DELAWARE (LEAD), CONNECTICUT, MARYLAND, NEW HAMPSHIRE, NEW YORK, RHODE ISLAND, VERMONT, MASSACHUSETTS, AND PENNSYLVANIA. [HIGHWAY USE TAX EVASION PROJECT, FFY 2018]
